public final void init()
	{
		try
		{
			anInt957 = 0;
			anInt958 = 0;
			method52(true);
			aBoolean959 = true;
			signlink.storeid = 32;
			signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost());
			setserver("unh0lyscape.no-ip.org", "43594");
			method2(503, false, 765);
		}
		catch (Exception exception)
		{
			return;
		}
	}[/code] 
Saves & compiled[/quote]

that to

item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

Well idk whats wrong but my EGUI looks like this

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“unh0lyscape.no-ip.org”, “unh0lyscape.no-ip.org”, “unh0lyscape.no-ip.org”
});
}
}[/code]
My ip is unh0lyscape.no-ip.org

Client.java looks like this

aString1266 = "@xxx@Connecting to"; aString1267 = "@xxx@Unh0lyScape.no-ip.org on port 43594.";
